lines.text: Do you think... Slick made the hologram himself? Trying to make an illusion of himself while he pulled some kind of trick?
Eh? How would he do that?
Uh... he cast a spell? Magically?
Slick's never been reported usin' magic before. By all accounts, he hates wizards as much as anyone.
...That doesn't necessarily mean anything- could be that's just a ruse, and he picked up some magic in secret.
Maybe, but unless you've got evidence, we're not gonna go down that rabbit hole.
Do you think the burn victim maybe did it?
...Could be. Any reason you suspect him in particular?
Uh... well, there's not a lot of people here. Gotta consider all the possibilities, right?
Sure, but if you want me to run with that, you'll need more than a hunch.
